608650.name: Waking The Glares - Chapters I and II - eBook
608650.description:
"Once upon a time there was the Stasis. The Universe knew only darkness and silence. Four planets, stone spheres, stood still, with no life and no time.
Then in the heart of the planets the heat started growing. And with heat came Transformation."

Discover the mysterious book, the book that has changed everything.

These are Chapters I and II from the book behind the game.

This ebook will be downloaded to your computer in four formats: EPUB, AZW3, MOBI and PDF. To access your ebook, follow these steps:
- Right click Waking the Glares - Chapters I and II in your Steam Library
- Select Properties
- Go to the Local Files tab
- Click Browse Local Files
- Transfer the files you need in your device and enjoy!
